meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Denmark and Norway.
meanings.sent1: In Denmark, you can buy a lot with just one krone.
meanings.sent2: She saved up all her kroner to buy a new bike.
meanings.sent3: The krone rolled off the table and into the piggy bank.
meanings.sent4: The shiny krone sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the krone dropping into the jar was satisfying.

meanings.sent1: The queen's krone was adorned with precious gems.
meanings.sent2: The royal family displayed their historic kroner in the museum.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked the krone off the statue's head.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a queen wearing the sparkling krone.
meanings.sent5: The golden krone gleamed under the spotlight.
